title: IAA Tonight | 2019 NFL DPOY & Colts CB Stephon Gilmore Joins the Show!
description: 2019 Defensive Player of the Year, 2x First-team All-Pro, 5x Pro Bowler, Super Bowl Champion, and Colts CB Stephon Gilmore joins the show to discuss his game saving play against the Broncos on Thursday Night, Brady and Belichick, why corners aren't performing at a high level, and comparisons between him and Darrelle Revis. Brandon Marshall, LeSean McCoy, and Leger Douzable also discuss the questionable roughing the passer calls that occured during the Buccaneers vs. Falcons and Raiders vs. Chiefs.
author: smanderville@houseofathlete.com (Leger Douzable, Brandon Marshall, Omar Kelly, Stephon Gilmore)
